非推奨のAPI

コンテンツ

  • 非推奨のフィールド
  • 非推奨のメソッド
  • 非推奨のフィールド 
    フィールドと説明
    com.amoad.AMoAdView.AlphaAnimation
    Use AMoAdView.RotateTransition.ALPHA
    com.amoad.AMoAdView.AnimationNone
    Use AMoAdView.RotateTransition.NONE
    com.amoad.AMoAdView.RotateAnimation
    Use AMoAdView.RotateTransition.ROTATE
    com.amoad.AMoAdView.ScaleAnimation
    Use AMoAdView.RotateTransition.SCALE
    com.amoad.AMoAdView.TranslateAnimation
    Use AMoAdView.RotateTransition.TRANSLATE
  • 非推奨のメソッド 
    メソッドと説明
    com.amoad.AMoAdNativeInfo.loadIcon(AMoAdNativeInfo.ImageLoadListener)
    com.amoad.AMoAdNativeInfo.loadImage(AMoAdNativeInfo.ImageLoadListener)
    com.amoad.AMoAdView.requestFreshAd() 
    com.amoad.AdItem.sendImpression(Context)
    com.amoad.AMoAdView.setClickAanimation(boolean) 
    com.amoad.AMoAdView.setContentSizeIdentifier(int)
    表示の向きの指定は必要なくなりました
    com.amoad.InterstitialAd.setDialogShown(String, boolean)
    com.amoad.InterstitialAd.setDisplayClickable(String, boolean)
    com.amoad.InterstitialAd.setPanel(String, int)
    com.amoad.AMoAdView.setRotationAnimation(int) 
    com.amoad.InterstitialAd.show(String, InterstitialAd.OnCloseListener)
